list.name: Episodes
list.rawQuery: SELECT peak_timestamp as time, CONCAT('Episode: ', dominant_sensor, ' (', CAST(duration_h as VARCHAR), 'h)') as text, 'Episode' as tags FROM ACM_EpisodeDiagnostics WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND peak_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND peak_timestamp <= $__timeTo()

targets.rawSql: SELECT TOP 1 HealthIndex FROM ACM_HealthTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN HealthIndex >= 85 THEN 'HEALTHY' WHEN HealthIndex >= 70 THEN 'CAUTION' ELSE 'ALERT' END as Status FROM ACM_HealthTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

DECLARE @CurrentHealth FLOAT; SELECT TOP 1 @CurrentHealth = HealthIndex FROM ACM_HealthTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY Timestamp DESC; IF @CurrentHealth >= 90.0 SELECT 168.0 AS RUL_Hours ELSE SELECT TOP 1 RUL_Hours FROM ACM_RUL WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_RUL WHERE EquipID = $equipment) ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT(SensorName, ' (z=', CAST(ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) as VARCHAR), ')') as WorstSensor FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment) ORDER BY LatestAbsZ DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as ActiveEpisodes FROM ACM_EpisodeDiagnostics WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(peak_timestamp)
SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel as VARCHAR)) as CurrentRegime FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
SELECT Timestamp AS time, HealthIndex, FusedZ FROM ACM_HealthTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp
SELECT Timestamp AS time, SensorName AS metric, NormValue AS value FROM ACM_SensorNormalized_TS WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp, SensorName

SELECT TOP 20 SensorName AS [Sensor Name], ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) AS [Current Z-Score], ROUND(MaxAbsZ, 2) AS [Peak Z-Score], MaxTimestamp AS [Peak Time], ROUND(LatestValue, 2) AS [Current Value], ROUND(TrainMean, 2) AS [Normal Mean], AboveAlertCount AS [Alert Count], CASE WHEN LatestAbsZ >= 3 THEN 'ALERT' WHEN LatestAbsZ >= 2 THEN 'CAUTION' ELSE 'NORMAL' END AS [Level] FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(MaxTimestamp) AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment) ORDER BY LatestAbsZ DESC

SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel AS VARCHAR(10))) AS value
FROM
  ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE
  EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY
  Timestamp

-- Calculate occupancy from timeline data (ACM_RegimeOccupancy has incorrect 0% values)
WITH TotalCounts AS (
  SELECT RegimeLabel, COUNT(*) AS RecordCount,
    CAST(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS Percentage
  FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
  WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  GROUP BY RegimeLabel
)
SELECT CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel AS VARCHAR)) AS regime, Percentage AS value
FROM TotalCounts
WHERE Percentage > 0
ORDER BY Percentage DESC

-- Calculate from timeline data (ACM_RegimeOccupancy has incorrect 0 values)
SELECT RegimeLabel AS RegimeName, COUNT(*) AS TimeSpent
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
GROUP BY RegimeLabel
ORDER BY RegimeLabel
SELECT MetricName as metric, ROUND(MetricValue, 2) as value FROM ACM_RegimeStability WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_RegimeStability WHERE EquipID = $equipment)

WITH LatestRun AS ( SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM ACM_HealthForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC ) SELECT f.Timestamp AS time, f.ForecastHealth AS [Forecast Health], f.CiLower AS [CI Lower], f.CiUpper AS [CI Upper] FROM ACM_HealthForecast f JOIN LatestRun r ON f.RunID = r.RunID WHERE f.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(f.Timestamp) ORDER BY f.Timestamp

SELECT Timestamp AS time, FailureProb * 100.0 AS [Failure Probability] FROM ACM_FailureForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM ACM_FailureForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC) ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT Timestamp AS time, 'Health Forecast' AS metric, ForecastHealth AS value FROM ACM_HealthForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM ACM_HealthForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC) UNION ALL SELECT Timestamp AS time, 'Confidence Lower' AS metric, CiLower AS value FROM ACM_HealthForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM ACM_HealthForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC) UNION ALL SELECT Timestamp AS time, 'Confidence Upper' AS metric, CiUpper AS value FROM ACM_HealthForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM ACM_HealthForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC) ORDER BY time, metric

-- v10: ACM_DetectorForecast_TS not yet populated in forecasting refactor
WITH LatestRun AS ( SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM ACM_DetectorForecast_TS WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC ) SELECT f.Timestamp AS time, f.DetectorName AS metric, f.ForecastValue AS value FROM ACM_DetectorForecast_TS f JOIN LatestRun r ON f.RunID = r.RunID WHERE f.EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY f.Timestamp, f.DetectorName

WITH LatestPerTs AS ( SELECT EquipID, Timestamp, MAX(CreatedAt) AS LatestCreatedAt FROM ACM_HealthForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) GROUP BY EquipID, Timestamp ) SELECT f.Timestamp AS time, 'Forecast (as-of stitched)' AS metric, f.ForecastHealth AS value FROM ACM_HealthForecast f JOIN LatestPerTs lp ON f.EquipID = lp.EquipID AND f.Timestamp = lp.Timestamp AND f.CreatedAt = lp.LatestCreatedAt WHERE f.EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY f.Timestamp ASC

WITH Runs AS ( SELECT DISTINCT EquipID, RunID, MAX(CreatedAt) AS RunCreatedAt FROM ACM_HealthForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment GROUP BY EquipID, RunID ), TopRuns AS ( SELECT RunID, RunCreatedAt, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY RunCreatedAt DESC) AS rk FROM Runs ) SELECT f.Timestamp AS time, CONCAT('Run ', CAST(tr.rk AS NVARCHAR)) AS metric, f.ForecastHealth AS value FROM ACM_HealthForecast f JOIN TopRuns tr ON f.RunID = tr.RunID WHERE f.EquipID = $equipment AND tr.rk <= 5 ORDER BY tr.RunCreatedAt DESC, f.Timestamp

-- v10: Show top anomalous sensors (ACM_RUL_Attribution removed, no true attribution available)
SELECT TOP 10 
  SensorName, 
  ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) AS AnomalySeverity, 
  AboveAlertCount AS AlertCount, 
  MaxTimestamp AS PeakTime
FROM ACM_SensorHotspots
WHERE EquipID = $equipment 
  AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment)
ORDER BY LatestAbsZ DESC
SELECT Timestamp AS time, 'OMR_Z' AS metric, OMR_Z AS value FROM ACM_OMRTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT
  o.Timestamp AS time,
  'OMR_Z' AS metric,
  o.OMR_Z AS value
FROM
  ACM_OMRTimeline o
WHERE
  o.EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(o.Timestamp)
UNION
ALL
SELECT
  s.Timestamp AS time,
  'AR1_Z' AS metric,
  s.ar1_z AS value
FROM
  ACM_Scores_Wide s
WHERE
  s.EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(s.Timestamp)
  AND s.ar1_z IS NOT NULL
UNION
ALL
SELECT
  s.Timestamp AS time,
  'PCA_SPE_Z' AS metric,
  s.pca_spe_z AS value
FROM
  ACM_Scores_Wide s
WHERE
  s.EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(s.Timestamp)
  AND s.pca_spe_z IS NOT NULL
UNION
ALL
SELECT
  s.Timestamp AS time,
  'IForest_Z' AS metric,
  s.iforest_z AS value
FROM
  ACM_Scores_Wide s
WHERE
  s.EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(s.Timestamp)
  AND s.iforest_z IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  time,
  metric

SELECT TOP 20 SensorName, AVG(ContributionPct) AS AvgContribution, MAX(ContributionPct) AS MaxContribution, COUNT(*) AS Occurrences FROM ACM_OMRContributionsLong WHERE EquipID = $equipment GROUP BY SensorName ORDER BY AvgContribution DESC

SELECT
  r.RegimeLabel,
  AVG(o.OMR_Z) AS AvgOMR_Z,
  MAX(o.OMR_Z) AS MaxOMR_Z,
  MIN(o.OMR_Z) AS MinOMR_Z,
  COUNT(*) AS SampleCount
FROM
  ACM_OMRTimeline o
  INNER JOIN ACM_RegimeTimeline r ON o.EquipID = r.EquipID
  AND o.Timestamp = r.Timestamp
WHERE
  o.EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(o.Timestamp)
GROUP BY
  r.RegimeLabel
ORDER BY
  r.RegimeLabel

SELECT TOP 50 episode_id AS EpisodeID, peak_timestamp AS PeakTime, duration_h AS DurationHours, peak_z AS MaxFusedZ, avg_z AS AvgFusedZ, severity AS Severity, dominant_sensor AS DetectionMethod FROM ACM_EpisodeDiagnostics WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(peak_timestamp) ORDER BY peak_timestamp DESC

SELECT
  TOP 30 peak_timestamp as StartTimestamp,
  DATEADD(HOUR, duration_h, peak_timestamp) as EndTimestamp,
  dominant_sensor AS Culprit,
  duration_h as Duration,
  severity AS Contribution,
  avg_z AS AvgZScore
FROM
  ACM_EpisodeDiagnostics
WHERE
  EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY
  peak_timestamp DESC,
  severity DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN duration_h < 0.167 THEN '< 10 min' WHEN duration_h < 0.5 THEN '10-30 min' WHEN duration_h < 1.0 THEN '30-60 min' WHEN duration_h < 2.0 THEN '1-2 hours' ELSE '> 2 hours' END AS DurationBucket, COUNT(*) AS EpisodeCount FROM ACM_EpisodeDiagnostics WHERE EquipID = $equipment GROUP BY CASE WHEN duration_h < 0.167 THEN '< 10 min' WHEN duration_h < 0.5 THEN '10-30 min' WHEN duration_h < 1.0 THEN '30-60 min' WHEN duration_h < 2.0 THEN '1-2 hours' ELSE '> 2 hours' END

SELECT
  TOP 30 Timestamp AS DetectedAt,
  DetectorType AS Detector,
    Direction,
  ZScore AS Magnitude

FROM
  ACM_ThresholdCrossings
WHERE
  EquipID = $equipment
  AND Direction IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  Timestamp DESC
SELECT Timestamp AS time, DetectorType AS metric, ZScore AS value FROM ACM_ThresholdCrossings WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp
SELECT Timestamp AS time, 'Failure Probability' AS metric, FailureProb AS value FROM ACM_FailureForecast WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT TOP 15 DetectorType AS detector, ContributionPct AS contribution, ZScore AS zscore FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent WHERE EquipID = $equipment) ORDER BY ContributionPct DESC

SELECT Timestamp AS time, DetectorType AS detector, ContributionPct AS contribution FROM ACM_ContributionTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp, DetectorType

SELECT DetectorType as [Detector], ROUND(MeanZ, 2) as [Mean Z], ROUND(P95Z, 2) as [P95 Z], ROUND(P99Z, 2) as [P99 Z], ROUND(ClipZ, 1) as [Clip Threshold], ROUND(SaturationPct, 1) as [Saturation %] FROM ACM_CalibrationSummary WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_CalibrationSummary WHERE EquipID = $equipment)

SELECT ComponentName as [Component], ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN MetricType = 'VarianceRatio' THEN Value END), 4) as [Variance %], ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN MetricType = 'CumulativeVariance' THEN Value END), 4) as [Cumulative %] FROM ACM_PCA_Metrics WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND ComponentName <> 'Total' GROUP BY ComponentName ORDER BY ComponentName

SELECT
  COALESCE(PairLabel, DetectorA + ' <-> ' + DetectorB) AS Pair,
  DisturbanceHint as 'Disturbance Hint',
  AVG(PearsonR) AS Correlation
FROM ACM_DetectorCorrelation
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_DetectorCorrelation WHERE EquipID = $equipment)
GROUP BY PairLabel, DisturbanceHint, DetectorA, DetectorB
ORDER BY correlation DESC;

SELECT
  TotalEpisodes as [Total Episodes],
  ROUND(AvgDurationHours, 1) as [Avg Duration (h)],
  ROUND(MaxDurationHours, 1) as [Max Duration (h)],
  ROUND(RatePerDay, 2) as [Episodes/Day],
  ROUND(MeanInterarrivalHours, 1) as [Interarrival (h)]
FROM
  ACM_EpisodeMetrics
WHERE
  EquipID = $equipment
  AND RunID = (
    SELECT
      MAX(RunID)
    FROM
      ACM_EpisodeMetrics
    WHERE
      EquipID = $equipment
  )

SELECT ht.Timestamp AS time, 'FusedZ' AS metric, ht.FusedZ AS value FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ht WHERE ht.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(ht.Timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT ht.Timestamp AS time, 'Adaptive Threshold' AS metric, (SELECT TOP 1 ThresholdValue FROM ACM_ThresholdMetadata WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND ThresholdType = 'fused_alert_z' AND RegimeID IS NULL AND IsActive = 1 ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC) AS value FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ht WHERE ht.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(ht.Timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT ht.Timestamp AS time, 'Hardcoded 3.0' AS metric, 3.0 AS value FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ht WHERE ht.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(ht.Timestamp) ORDER BY time, metric

SELECT
  TOP 200 RunID,
  EquipID,
  LoggedAt,
  Level,
  SUBSTRING(Message, 1, 400) AS Message
FROM
  ACM_RunLogs
WHERE
  EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(LoggedAt)
ORDER BY
  LoggedAt DESC

SELECT
  ParamPath,
  ParamValue,
  ValueType,
  UpdatedAt
FROM
  ACM_Config
ORDER BY
  UpdatedAt desc

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT EquipID FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ORDER BY EquipID
list.label: Equipment
list.name: equipment
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT EquipID FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ORDER BY EquipID
